root.name: Ninja Escape
root.description: Â In Ninja Escape player is controlling a ninja who is escaping multiple armed ninjas by jumping from a ledge. Game has 10 levels with increasing difficulty. The difficult levels being longer and more narrow to navigate in. Three colored fences are place to slow down the descent. These are mapped for controllers 3 face button (blue, green and red). By timing the correct color with correct button player can pass through the fence without slowing down.The jump is graded by three medals (gold, silver and bronze). The faster the jump the better score. Gold coins can be collected for extra points.
